p: Current seasonal LAIV can be generated either by classical reassortment in embryonated chicken eggs or by the newly developed plasmid-based reverse genetic techniques [ 38, 125]. These contain the six inteRNAl genes (PB2, PB1, PA, NP, M, and NS) from the original ts, ca, att master donor virus (MDV) A/Ann Arbor/6/60 H2N2 and the two viral glycoproteins (HA and NA) from predicted circulating seasonal IAV ( Figure 4B).
